testcase.name: Verify all courses from homepages (names and professors)

failure.message: Course Master thesis does not have a professor.

testcase.failure:
Given the user is on the Ansymo homepage....................................passed When the user clicks the "Courses" link in the menu section.................passed Then the user should see a page with all the courses listed.................passed And for each course, there should be a page that is loaded and there should be a professor.failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: Course Master thesis does not have a professor. at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at org.junit.Assert.assertFalse(Assert.java:65) at pageObjects.CoursesPage.selectEachCourseAndVerifyDetails(CoursesPage.java:73) at stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.verifyCourseAndProfessorNames(BrowseCoursesSteps.java:62) at ✽.for each course, there should be a page that is loaded and there should be a professor(file:///C:/ST/AnsymoBDD2/src/test/resources/features/BrowseCourses.feature:13)
